data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module extends system() to allow timeout after the specified
    seconds.

    I think "System::Timeout" accurately describes what it is done.

    So, people will get what them want when they search "system
    timeout" on CPAN.I think that`s the keywords that people will type
    in the search box.
